displayName.japanese: 全てのトロフィー獲得

description.english: Earn all trophies.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i trofei.
description.french: Remportez tous les trophées.
description.german: Erlange alle Trophäen.
description.spanish: Gana todos los trofeos.
description.arabic: ‏احصل على جميع الجوائز.
description.japanese: 全てのトロフィーを獲得する｡

description.english: Use Payback Instant Recovery to quickly rise after being knocked down. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Usa il Payback Recupero istantaneo per rialzarti subito da terra (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Utilisez la Récupération instantanée Payback après avoir été mis à terre. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Komm mit Payback Soforterholung nach einem K.O. wieder auf die Beine. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Usa Recuperación instantánea de Venganza para levantarte rápidamente. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏استخدم Payback Instant Recovery للنهوض سريعًا بعد الإطاحة بك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Payback: Instant Recoveryを発動する

description.english: Use Payback Spray Poison Mist to your opponent's face. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Usa il Payback Nebbia velenosa sul volto dell'avversario (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Utilisez la Brume empoisonnée Payback au visage de votre adversaire. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Setze Payback Giftspray Versprühen gegen das Gesicht deines Gegners ein. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Usa la Niebla de veneno de Venganza en el rostro de tu oponente. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏استخدم Payback Spray Poison Mist في وجه خصمك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Payback: Poison Mistを発動して、Poison Mistを成功させる

displayName.german: Ich werde für dich da sein!

description.english: Activate the Run-In Payback. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.german: Aktiviere den Eingreifen-Payback. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Activez l'intervention Payback. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Attiva il Payback Interferenza (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.spanish: Activa la Interferencia de Venganza. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.japanese: Payback: Run-Inを発動して、Run-Inを成功させる
description.arabic: ‏قم بتنشيط تدخل Payback. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)

description.english: Max out your grapple speed using Beast Mode. (MyPLAYER mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Massimizza la velocità prese usando Bestia scatenata (Il mio GIOCATORE contro IA).
description.french: Maximisez votre vitesse de prise en utilisant le mode Bestial. (Mon JOUEUR contre I.A.)
description.german: Maximiere dein Grifftempo mit dem Beast Mode. (Gegen KI in Mein SPIELER)
description.spanish: Aumenta al máximo tu velocidad de llave usando el modo Bestia. (Mi JUGADOR contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏ارفع سرعة اشتباكك إلى الحد الأقصى مستخدمًا الوحش (MyPLAYER ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: グラップルスピードを最大化しろ

description.english: Hit your Finisher immediately after activating Blackout Payback. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Metti a segno la mossa finale subito dopo il Payback Blackout (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Utilisez votre Finisher juste après avoir activé le Blackout Payback. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Benutze deinen Finisher direkt nach Aktivierung des Blackout-Paybacks. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Usa tu remate justo después de activar Venganza de Interferencia. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏اضرب باستخدام Finisher مباشرة بعد تنشيط Blackout Payback (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Blackout Payback Abilityを発動後、すぐに相手にFinisherを当てろ

description.english: Use the Tank buff to minimize damage from your opponent's Finisher. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Usa Carrarmato per indebolire la mossa finale avversaria (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Utilisez l'avantage Tank pour minimiser les dégâts du Finisher adverse. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Reduziere mit dem Tank-Bonus den Schaden des Finishers deines Gegners. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Usa el potenciador Tanque y minimiza el daño del remate de tu rival. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏استخدم دفعة Tank لتقليل ضرر Finisher خصمك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Tank Buffを使って相手のフィニッシャーのダメージを最小化しろ

description.english: Use 3 Payback auto-reversals in a single match. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Esegui 3 Payback Contrattacco automatico nello stesso match (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Réussissez 3 contres automatiques Payback dans le même match. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Führe 3 automatische Payback-Reversals in einem einzigen Match aus. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Usa tres inversiones automáticas de Venganza en un mismo combate. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏نفذ 3 حركات عكس Payback تلقائية في مباراة واحدة. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 1試合の間にオートリバーサルを3回使え

description.english: Use Payback low blow to slow your opponent down. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Esegui il Payback Colpo basso per rallentare l'avversario (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Utilisez le coup bas Payback pour ralentir votre adversaire. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Nimm deinem Gegner mit einem Payback-Tiefschlag den Fahrtwind. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Usa el golpe bajo de Venganza para ralentizar a tu oponente. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏استخدم ضربة Payback تحت الحزام لإبطاء سرعة خصمك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Low Blowを使って相手の動きを動きを遅くしろ

description.english: Finish your opponent using a possum pin. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Batti l'avversario per schienamento dopo aver usato Finto esanime (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Achevez votre adversaire avec un tombé après avoir fait le mort. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Besiege deinen Gegner mit einem Possum-Pin. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Acaba con tu oponente con un pin de zarigüella. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: قم بالقضاء على خصمك مستخدمًا مهارة التثبيت Possum. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)‏
description.japanese: Possum pinを使って試合に決着をつけろ

description.english: Deliver a maxed out Charged Fury strike. (MyPLAYER mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Infliggi un colpo Furia distruttrice caricato al massimo (Il mio GIOCATORE contro IA).
description.french: Infligez une Furie Chargée au maximum de sa charge. (Mon JOUEUR contre I.A.)
description.german: Lande einen voll aufgeladenen Charged Fury-Schlag. (Gegen KI in Mein SPIELER)
description.spanish: Ejecuta un ataque de Furia enérgica al máximo de potencia. (Mi JUGADOR contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏سدد ضربة Charged Fury قوية. (MyPLAYER ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: フルチャージされた打撃を相手にお見舞いしろ

description.english: Defeat your opponent with their own Finisher. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'avversario con la sua mossa finale (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Venez à bout de votre adversaire avec son propre Finisher. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Besiege deinen Gegner mit seinem eigenen Finisher. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Derrota a tu oponente con su propio remate. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏اهزم خصمك بالـFinisher الخاص به. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 相手のフィニッシャーを使って相手を倒せ

description.english: Use Resiliency twice with a single Superstar in Royal Rumble. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Usa Determinazione 2 volte con la stessa Superstar nella Royal Rumble (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Utilisez deux fois une Révolte avec une seule Superstar en Royal Rumble. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Setze mit einem Superstar zweimal Widerstand im Royal Rumble ein. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Usa la resistencia dos veces con una Superstar en Royal Rumble. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏استخدم مهارة Resilience مرتين مع Superstar واحد في Royal Rumble. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: ロイヤルランブルの1試合の間に一人のキャラクターでResiliencyを2回使え

description.english: Earn 100 momentum in a single Electrifying charge. (MyPLAYER mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Ottieni 100 Slancio con la stessa carica Elettrizzante (Il mio GIOCATORE contro IA).
description.french: Gagnez 100 de momentum en une seule Électrisation. (Mon JOUEUR contre I.A.)
description.german: Erreiche 100 Schwung mit einer einzigen Electrify-Ladung. (Gegen KI in Mein SPIELER)
description.spanish: Consigue un impulso de 100 con Sobrecarga: Electrizante. (Mi JUGADOR contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏اجمع 100 من النشاط في شحنة Electrifying واحدة. (MyPLAYER ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 1回の使用でモメンタムを100溜めろ

description.english: Get DQed by using Payback Power of the Punch in a title match. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Squalifica usando il Payback Tirapugni d'acciaio in un match titolato (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Soyez DQ d'un match pour le titre à cause d'un Power of the Punch Payback. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Verliere ein Titelmatch durch DQ mit dem Payback Power of the Punch. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Sé descalificado con Puñetazo demoledor de Venganza en un combate por el título. (Exhib. contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏استبعد باستخدام Payback Power of the Punch في مباراة على اللقب. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: タイトルマッチでPower of the Punchを使用して自分を違反負けにしろ

displayName.japanese: Hell In A Cell: Wall Break

description.english: Put your opponent through the cell wall. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Fai sfondare la parete della cella al tuo avversario (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Faites passer votre adversaire à travers la paroi de la cage. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Schmettere deinen Gegner durch die Käfigwand. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Haz que tu rival acabe contra la pared de la celda. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏ألقِ بخصمك عبر جدار الزنزانة. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 対戦相手をセルの壁ごと突き抜けさせろ

displayName.japanese: Hell In A Cell: Ceiling Break

description.english: Put your opponent through the top of the cell. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Fai sfondare il tetto della cella al tuo avversario (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Faites passer votre adversaire à travers le plafond de la cage. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Schmettere deinen Gegner durch die Käfigdecke. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Haz que tu rival acabe en lo alto de la celda. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏ألقِ بخصمك أعلى الزنزانة (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 対戦相手をセルの天井から天井ごと突き落とせ

description.english: Steel Cage: Escape through the door. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Steel Cage: fuggi dalla porta (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Steel Cage : échappez-vous par la porte. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Steel Cage: Entkomme durch die Tür. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Steel Cage: escapa por la puerta. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏Steel Cage: اهرب عبر الباب. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Steel Cage - ドアから脱出する(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Steel Cage: Slam the opponent against the cage with Hammer Throw. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Steel Cage: lancia l'avversario contro la gabbia con Lancio del martello (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Steel Cage : Plaquez un adv. contre la cage avec une projection puissante. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Steel Cage: Schmettere deinen Gegner per Hammerwurf gegen den Käfig. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Steel Cage: estampa al oponente contra la jaula con Hammer Throw. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏Steel Cage: اضرب الخصم ضربة عنيفة نحو القفص بـHammer Throw. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Steel Cage - Hammer Throwで相手をケージに衝突させる(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: As Braun Strowman, slam Big Show through the Steel Cage wall. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Come Braun Strowman, fai sfondare la gabbia a Big Show (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Avec Braun Strowman, envoyez Big Show au travers de la paroi de la cage. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Schmettere als Braun Strowman Big Show durch die Käfigwand. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Como Braun Strowman, aplasta a Big Show contra la Steel Cage. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏كـBraun Strowman، اضرب Big Show ضربة عنيفة على جدار Steel Cage. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Steel Cage - Cageを破壊する(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Steel Cage: Push off an opponent from atop the Cage. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Steel Cage: fai cadere un avversario dalla sommità della gabbia (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Steel Cage : Poussez un adversaire du haut de la cage. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Steel Cage: Stoße einen Gegner vom Käfig herunter. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Steel Cage: empuja a un oponente desde lo alto de la jaula. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏Steel Cage: ادفع خصم من أعلى القفص. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Steel Cage -  Cageの頂上で相手を落とす(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Steel Cage: Hit an opponent with a Diving attack from atop the Cage. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Steel Cage: tuffati su un avversario dalla sommità della gabbia (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Steel Cage: Réussissez une attaque plongeante depuis le sommet de la cage. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Steel Cage: Triff einen Gegner mit einem Sprungangriff vom Käfig. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Steel Cage: haz un ataque en plancha desde lo alto de la jaula. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏Steel Cage: اضرب خصم بهجمة قفز من أعلى القفص. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Steel Cage - Cageの頂上からダイビング攻撃を相手に当てる(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Steel Cage: Slam an opponent against the Cage wall using Carry. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Steel Cage: scaglia l'avversario contro la gabbia usando Trasporto (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Steel Cage : Jetez un adversaire contre la paroi de la cage. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Steel Cage: Schmettere einen Gegner per Tragegriff gegen die Käfigwand. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Steel Cage: aplasta a un oponente contra la jaula usando Porte. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏Steel Cage: اضرب خصمك بعنف على جدار القفص مستخدمًا مهارة الحمل. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Steel Cage - グラップルキャリーを使用してCageの壁に相手を叩きつける(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Win a Title by cashing in your custom MITB. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Vinci un titolo incassando una valigetta MITB personalizzata (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Remportez un match pour le titre en utilisant votre MITB personnalisée. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Gewinne einen Titel, indem du deinen erstellten MITB-Koffer einlöst. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Gana un título canjeando tu MITB personalizado. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏فز بلقب عن طريق استخدام MITB المخصصة الخاصة بك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 自分の(作った)MitBを使ってタイトルマッチでキャッシュインをして試合に勝て

description.spanish: SHOWCASE: Completa el primer combate.

description.english: Perform and win a match with CEL SHADING enabled. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Vinci un match con il CEL SHADING attivato (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Disputez et remportez un match avec l'option CEL SHADING activée. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Absolviere und gewinne ein Match bei aktiviertem CEL SHADING. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Ejecuta y gana un combate con CEL SHADING activado. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏قم بالأداء والفوز في مباراة بتفعيل خاصية ‏تظليل سليولويد. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: CEL SHADINGを有効にした試合を行い、勝利する (PLAY mode against A.I.)

description.english: Win a match using a custom Superstar with Block Body. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Vinci usando una Superstar personalizzata con Corpo a blocchi (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.french: Remportez un match avec une Superstar personnalisée qui a un Corps Cube. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.german: Gewinne ein Match mit einem erstellten Superstar mit Blockkörper. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.spanish: Gana un combate con una Superstar personalizada usando Cuerpo bloque. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏فز في مباراة مستعينًا بـSuperstar مخصص بـBlock Body. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Block Bodyを使用したCustom Superstarを使用して試合に勝利する (PLAY mode against A.I.)
